name: Canada Man - A Wizard in Portugal: London Flower vs. Russia hop!
name_original: Canada Man - A Wizard in Portugal: London Flower vs. Russia hop!
description:
WARNING- This game is Incredibly Fun! Explore an AWESOME and MYSTERIOUS world, filled with loads of unique, but unwelcoming monsters!

Dodge obstacles, and avoid Magical Monsters, as you venture far into the unknown... What are you waiting for? Try playing this addictive game now!

Seriously. It's fun.
